def_cn: （表演平衡动作用的）高空钢丝，空中绳索
def_en: A high wire is a length of rope or wire stretched tight high above the ground and used for balancing acts.

def_cn: （报刊用语）危险的状态，走钢丝，（行为）容易犯错误的
def_en: Journalists talk about a person being on a high wire or performing a high-wire act when he or she is dealing with a situation in which it would be easy to do the wrong thing.
